text:
Coinsquare | React and/or Node + Dev Ops | Toronto, ON | On Site | Full-time | www.coinsquare.com

Coinsquare is Canadaâ€™s leading and most secure digital asset trading platform for trading Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other digital currencies.

We've raised over $60M to date, growing from one employee in April 2017 to over 150 employees by April 2018. We just moved into a 28k sqft office in the heart of downtown Toronto and are looking to fill it!

I'm specifically looking to build out our frontend team and am looking for React devs. If you're interested, reach out with a resume at shawn.gustaw@coinsquare.io. Note: the qualifications are really only "nice to haves". I care more that you can learn quickly - if you don't know a specific technology I can probably teach you, so don't be discouraged from applying!

https://jobs.lever.co/coinsquare/a2ac13a6-d269-4bba-90a9-3b7...
